RelatedSentence: COTABATO CITY , Philippines --- Two men riding a motorcycle together shot dead Lanao del Sur assistant provincial prosecutor Simpal Alawi Sr .
COTABATO CITY , Philippines --- Two men riding a motorcycle together shot dead Lanao del Sur assistant provincial prosecutor Simpal Alawi Sr .

The victim , who was also a part - time instructor at the law school of the Mindanao State University in Marawi City , was on his way to office on board his vehicle when the suspects overtook the victim 's vehicle and opened fire with .45 caliber handguns .
